entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • WebView causes empty window popup and closes immediately #24933
  • .net8 maui ios app crashing on startup on actual device #24932
  • The picker allows you to write text if the keyboard is visible #24930
  • [Performance] DatePicker/TimePicker first render is too slow #24929
  • Content is not render properly when the 'Don't keep activities' setting is enabled #24927
  • The text entered in the Entry is not visible when using Handlers with BaseInputConnection while the Predictive Text option is enabled in the keyboard settings on Samsung devices. #24926
  • Toggled Command is always called 1 more time when a new window is opened #24925
  • [Windows]The border color of the input controls does not update when the theme changes. #24923
  • Accessibility iOS - Editor - Has 2 focusable components #24921
  • ListView with Grid in Data Template. GridUnitType.Star not specify a proportional size. #24920
  • Evaluate if StreamImageSourceService fails to read the stream if we should still throw #24917
    .NET 9 Servicing

Closed

  • Vertical ScrollBar is not visible until scrolled in Android platform. #24894
  • Upgrade from 8.0.70 to 8.0.82 Apple reports apple push notifications are being used. #24880
  • Can't release the C# object referenced by razor component in BlazorWebView #23654
  • [net9.0] MAUI new project doesn't have deploy checked for android configuration on Windows #24452
    9.0-rc2
  • Frame offsets inner content view by 1pt #23333
    .NET 8 SR9
  • Android ecosystem updates for `net9.0-rc2` #24566
    9.0-rc2
  • [WebAuthenticator] [Android 14] The redirection does not work after authentication #24904
  • Disabling RefreshView disables all underlying controls #24918
  • IOS Binding Library - the native class hasn't been loaded. #24881
  • Picker ItemDisplayBinding doesn't work with compiled bindings #23989
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • FlyoutItemIsVisible property in Shell Items is always true #24797
    Backlog
  • Visual State manager change in behavior in 8.0.90 breaks "Normal" #24849
    .NET 8 SR9

PullRequests

Created

  • LEGO: Pull request from lego/hb_7241b85a-f216-4d55-a9fa-d8030c736df5_20240925231640755 to net9.0 #24935
  • [UITesting] Moved ButtonHandler.ImageSourceInitializesCorrectly to Appium #24934
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, community ✨
  • [XC] Add feature switch to enable compiling bindings with source #24924
    area-xaml, 9.0-rc2
  • Fix for Windows SearchBar MaxLength > 0 not working properly. #24919
    community ✨

Merged

  • Update bug-report.yml SR9.1 #24931
  • Fix Frame offsets inner content view by 1pt #24582
    community ✨, area-controls-frame, s/pr-needs-author-input
  • Android Ecosystem updates for `net9.0-rc.2` #24665
    do-not-merge, area-infrastructure
  • [net9.0] Revert: Add MauiUIApplicationDelegate remote notification methods #24907
  • [X] Ignore Parent DataType on collection #24530
    area-xaml
  • [C] fix specificity comparison #24891

Updated

  • Re-enable tests #24912
  • Fix Provided consistent behavior of text color in tabbed page in all platforms. #24782
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨
  • AppThemeBinding on ToolbarItems #24886
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨, area-controls-menubar
  • Update default `BlazorWebView` host address #24884
    area-blazor
  • [testing] Fix CollectionView2 UITests #24471
    area-controls-collectionview, area-testing, 9.0-rc2
  • Bump WinAppSDK to 1.6 #24266
    area-infrastructure
  • [housekeeping] Update & Consolidate Appium + driver versions #24817
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [iOS] Text alignment in editor - improvements #24859
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • [Android] Fix scroll bar visibility set to Always not consistant #24901
    community ✨
  • Add Device logs to Integration Tests #24268
    area-testing, .NET 9.0 GA
  • Navigation memory leak: Appearing event not being unsubscribed properly #24507
    area-navigation, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix Editor control does not scroll properly on iOS when enclosed in a Border control. #24683
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • [Windows] Handle focus events using `FocusManager` (take 2) #24695
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-keyboard, t/perf
  • Fix Text entry border disappear when changing to/from dark mode in Android #24433
    community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • [iOS] Improve background layer frame mapping performance #24848
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix for the CollectionView to prevent duplicate groups or crashes when adding a new item to a group or when adding a new group. #24873
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Speed-up Border rendering by avoiding useless pass during size allocation #24844
    community ✨
  • Relative layout content disappeared when Relative layout has the border with border stroke element. #24841
    community ✨
  • [Android] Fix app crash caused by dynamic template switching in ListView #24808
    community ✨
  • Applying visibility change to child controls #20154
    community ✨, area-controls-general
  • FlyoutItemIsVisible property in Shell Items is always true #24871
    community ✨
  • [Android] Fix Flickering issue when calling Navigation.PopAsync #24887
    community ✨
